title: Masterpiece Sci Fi Thriller movie
review:
An US army was being used for a mission by the team of one sceientist to find out the bomber who attacks a train. He was in an experimental house name 'SOURCE CODE' .
As per sceientist the army could do only to find the bomber but he could not change the reality. Whenever he went to the past he saw himself in another man's body. What is the mystery?Who was that man where the soldier found himself?
Did the sceientist accomplish his experiment?
Did the army able to save those innocent lives?
What is 'SOURCE CODE' ? A time travel or a sceientefic research?
You have to watch the film to know about these answers.My personal rating is 10.00 out of 10.00.#SourceCode

title: Classy Crime Thriller!!!!
review:
My Personal Rating: 9.00 out of 10.00Learning Thing: Truth can never be hidden even if criminals are intelligent & powerful.Summary:In he small fishing town of Nightmute, Alaska, 17-year-old Kay Connell is found murdered. LAPD detectives Will Dormer and Hap Eckhart are sent to assist the local police with their investigation, at the request of police chief Nyback, an old colleague of Dormer's. Ellie Burr, a young local detective who is also a fan of Dormer's investigative work, picks them up when they arrive. Back in LA, Internal Affairs is investigating Dormer. Dormer with his department were to capture the culprit but he made a huge mistake there.
What mistake he did?
How his mistake affect the case????
To know the answer you have to see the film.
